channel.title: ~ [317] Project KSAM [BLANK DELTA] ~
channel.description:
I'm going to give credits before I start. Blank Source ~ Delta Client ~ Bluur [center][b]Skills -[/b] Combat Skills... Attack 100% Strength 100% Defence 100% Prayer 80% HP 100% Range 70% Magic 60%
Skills... Mining 100% Smithing 78% Woodcutting 100% Firemaking 100% Fletching 99% Fishing 80% Cooking 80% Runecrafting 100% (Abyss) Crafting 70% Thieving 76% Agility 100% Farming 100% Herblore 100% Slayer 100% (NPC XP)[/center]
Currently working on... PK Point Rewards - Gives you good armour that can only be got with PK Points, currently have Slayer Helm and Spirit Elysian Shield. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=__fGmkvxAnI]PK Points Video[/url] Giving all monsters Drops at a good rate - 56% Making fully working Ancients, so Barrage works on NPC's and hits multi and Blood spells work. Just adding all of the right affects. - 12% Making a new God Wars system where you have to get 5 Wizard kills for Bandos, 5 Bandos Kills for Saradomin, 5 Saradomin kills for Zamorak and then 5 Zamorak kills for Armadyl, each monster will drop their corrosponding items and because Armadyl has the best stats it is the last - 0% (Need Zammy, Sara and Arma god models)
NEW UPDATES: Released a new client, new HP Bars, new Right Click interface, Fog, direct links to the official site and the highscores in the client's GUI. Here's a picture of the HP Bar, Right click interface and the fog. [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/updaterzoroz.jpg[/img] I also fixed the map going Square, it stays Circle now.
Older updates: I have added the new Whip from Runescape to my client, this took me a while and I finished it a few days ago, just never got around to adding it here. [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/newwhipplawx.jpg[/img] Added highscores, thanks to deathchaos9's tutorial. I plan to edit the page to make it look more different and original. I am also working on changing the sprites.
Please post comments, I am going to update this often and add more images, the video is of a PK points system before I added the shield, I want suggestions and CONSTRUCTIVE criticism.
Thanks :)

item.title: ~ [317] Project KSAM [BLANK DELTA] ~
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

[quote="«MrJoe«, post:34, topic:292577"][quote author=the elve age link=topic=386553.msg2897173#msg2897173 date=1249278897]
This seems like you got delta’s base, took out anti leaches, got dragon-history and pvp planet, stole shit from it, then you put this on here. Honestly, nothing interesting. If you want to interest players, work on a 474.
[/quote]
Chill, Stop Hating. I think it look’s good, But I dont understand why everyone that is making new server’s are adding everything the new runescape has, The main reason I play is 'cause I want to play the old runescape.[/quote]

Thanks
I’m currently thinking about removing and re introducing some aspects of the older game, while still giving some advantages of the newer game.

Read full topic

item.title: ~ [317] Project KSAM [BLANK DELTA] ~
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

[quote=“i0b 0n, post:21, topic:292577”]‘Dragon history’ - New heard of it.
And ‘PVP Planet’ - Most shitty server I could think of.
It’s really , really horrible, some 13 yo kid coded it , from a tutorials from rune - server.
that’s all!
Plus this server isnt special too, every thing I see there , are from rune - servers tuts.[/quote]

Erm… I’m not 13, you think its horrible, thats your opinion, yes I may of used one or two tutorials, but I then re-coded them.

[quote=“pk3r john, post:22, topic:292577”][quote author=krazy karl link=topic=386553.msg2902140#msg2902140 date=1249590054]
No I’m aiming to re-create some of the stuff Runescape has, while improving the original game and adding some of my own ideas. I listen to my players suggestions on how to make the game better, then work at them to make the game a fun place to be on.
[/quote]

ok good luck on this, I’m looking forward to it.[/quote]

Thanks

Read full topic

item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

‘Did it my own’
Not really an accomplishment. Takes 20 minutes.

++
I hope when you show that all of your combat is 100%, you dont mean it came that way.
Deltascapes combat on the released source is maybe… 50%, probably less then that.
It takes some extreme editing (or renaming from emulous <3) to make deltascapes combat 100%
